jobInfo.postDescription:
• To perform User Acceptance Test in Insurance System for HSBC & HSIC (Asia-Pacific)
• At least 90% of PA time will be spent on this function if the jobholder is assigned to support the testing processes)
• To create test plan and test scenario plan according to project requirement
• To perform query creation in Insurance system as per user’s requirement
• To manage all project documentations, including UAT procedure/guideline and training manuals.
• To prepare Show & Tell session to end users
• To provide excellent service to customer and stakeholder, UAT staff will have the chance to rotate the role to provide dedicated support to Insurance Operations especially when external service pledge in risk
任职要求
• Bachelor's degree in related field or commensurate practical experience
• Life and Health Insurance experience preferred, or at least from Financial Institutions
• Ability to understand users’ requirement with their workflow and procedures
• Ability to understand product features
• Ability to understand IT Functional Specification / External Design Document
• Awareness of the testing process and experience of performing testing
• Highly developed communication skills, both written and verbal, to explain complex or technical issues
• Comprehension and ability in English
jobInfo.address: 广州越秀区广州汇丰大厦按地址分配

brandComInfo.introduce:
九天互娱是一家专注于开发移动网络游戏研发和运营的互联网公司，核心团队来自于头部互联网游戏公司，具有丰富的游戏研发和团队管理经验。
公司致力于打造一个温馨而富有创造力的工作环境，为员工提供充分的发展空间和机会。我们强调团队合作，鼓励员工分享创意和想法，激发彼此的潜力。
真挚是我们文化的基石，我们倡导诚实守信、真实坦诚的沟通。
欢迎加入我们，共同创造一个充满活力和温暖的企业家园，让游戏成为我们共同奋斗的象征。
